name: capacitor production, film type, for through-hole mounting | capacitor, film type, for through-hole mounting | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/6208/documentation

This dataset represents the production of 1 kg of film type capacitors for the through-hole mounting technology. It is based on the assumption that a typical film capacitor in electronic modules has an average weight of 0.7 g.The data represent a typical film type capacitor for hole-through mounting, used in the information and communication technology. Material data are taken from datasheets of producers of such capacitors and from the literature. Infrastructure and production efforts are based on own assumptions. The production efforts represent not a specific capacitor type and have thus, accordingly higher uncertainties.;Silver exchange was removed based on expert assumption.

From reception of metals and plastics at the factory gate.

This dataset includes raw material input and production efforts for the production of currently used film capacitors for hole-through mounting technology.
category: C:Manufacturing/26:Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products/261:Manufacture of electronic components and boards/2610:Manufacture of electronic components and boards

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data represent a global valuable composition of film type capacitors.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: average production composed of: formulation; build-up process; cutting; bisquing; Pre-Firing; Firing; Tumbling; Termination (SMT) resp. metallization; slitting; winding; metal spray; heat treatment; sawing; lead welding; epoxy filling (THT)

exchanges.description:
Film type capacitors have almost unlimited selfhealing capability. Short circuits are thus largely nonexistent. They exhibit high pulse handling and ripple current capability. Typical applications are mobile phones, television, automobiles, PCs and lamp ballasts.
EcoSpold01Location=GLO

flow.name: capacitor, film type, for through-hole mounting
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/26:Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products/261:Manufacture of electronic components and boards/2610:Manufacture of electronic components and boards

exchanges.description:
EcoSpold01Location=RER
Calculated Value. The production of 1 kg of capacitors lead to a waste amount of 0.48 kg unused raw materials. Hence, this dataset here has an input of 1.48 kg of raw materials per kg of capacitor. The split to the different raw materials (metals, plastics, etc.) is based on the reported  material specifications.

Further references
ZVEI (2006) Umbrella Specs. Download of December 21 from <http://www.zvei.org/index.php?id=1158>.
